articles.description: The South African comedian, 38, thanked his fans and the 'brilliant' Black women who are  'a lot of the reason why' he's succeeded in show business.
articles.content:
Trevor Noah paid tribute to the 'brilliant' black women in his life on his final edition of The Daily Show Thursday.
